episodes.synopsis: Disgraced journalist Mikael Blomkvist is hired by the wealthy Henrik Vanger to investigate the suspicious disappearance of his niece 40 years earlier.
episodes.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As Lisbeth and Mikael dig deeper in the investigation, they discover evidence pointing to a scripture-minded serial killer.
episodes.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Mikael Blomkvist is about to run an exposé on the sex-trafficking problem in Sweden when the leading investigative reporters are murdered.
episodes.title: The Girl Who Played with Fire: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: With Lisbeth still on the run, Mikael begins to track down the individuals listed in Dag Svensson's report in the hopes they will lead him to Zala.
episodes.title: The Girl Who Played with Fire: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Laid up in the intensive care unit with a bullet in her head, Lisbeth Salander prepares to stand trial for a triple murder she didn't commit.
episodes.title: The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: With corrupt forces conspiring to conceal the truth, Lisbeth takes the stand in her own defense.
episodes.title: The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest: Part 2

video.title: Dragon Tattoo Trilogy: Extended Edition
video.synopsis: This gripping trilogy starts with an investigation into a 40-year-old cold case and ends with a court case involving murder and government conspiracy.
